name: Sprintdict
tagline: SprintDict is Android app that allows users to search words and phrases in different StarDict format dictionaries.
body:
SprintDict is Android app that allows users to search words and phrases in different StarDict format dictionaries.
Functions & Features

*     Search in unlimited number of dictionaries.
*     Access dictionaries on internal or external storage.
*     Enable/disable selected dictionaries.
*     Suggestions while typing a search request.
*     Change the sequence of search results by changing dictionaries' order of succession.
*     Expand/collapse search results by individual dictionary.
*     Change font sizes, zoom in and zoom out.
*     Find a word "on page".
*     Recent search history.
*     Integration with [Quick Search Box](http://googlemobile.blogspot.dk/2009/10/quick-search-box-for-android-search.html).

[Get it on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.bancer.sparkdict)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
